title: My Top Pick For 2019
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: With one cheap fund, you can own a globally diversified portfolio of low-volatility equities. Now that the market is going on sale, two such funds I have admired but not owned are becoming affordable again. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
